title: Detected a problem with your installation
body: Hi, I was 2/2 in my promos to silver yeah I suck at this game, but thats besides the point. I find it interesting how league decides to let me log in and enter champion selected all fine and dandy. Upon going to enter the game however the client tells my my installation is broken and needs to fix itself So while my team loads into the game I'm "afk"  they remake and I lose my promos. I feel cheated because my client decided to screw me out of playing my final promo.

replies.body: That's really strange, do you have a screenshot of the error upon loading into the game?  Was it a bugsplat?  In the meantime, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a Force Repatch to make sure your game files are  okay.  Let me know!
